Name: Block Heads: Instakill
About the game: Fast, kinetic action what more could you ask for! Did we mention there are active ragdolls? In this game every shot you land is a guaranteed kill - bullet sponges just aren't my style. With both solo and team based game modes there's something in there for everyone. One Shot - One Shot means One Kill; but sometimes one shot isn't enough, happens to the best of us... Customization - If they've spotted you and you don't end up dead - it's probably because they were in awe of your decked out character... Two Jumps - But most likely it's because you were able to evade their sights by double jumping to a more tactically sound position in the map... Map Editor - However if you couldn't it probably wasn't your fault! Just bad map design! So go and show them how it's really done with the easy to use map editor and a friend or two... or 16... Bots - All maps you make, and even default ones, are automatically playable by bots... Steam Workshop - After you're done making your map upload it to the Steam Workshop for others to play on... Custom Music - And take a break from all that hard work by joining a server that hosts your map while listening to any music you want (.ogg and .wav supported)... Game Modes - All while helping your team blast to the top in Team Death Match or shooting everyone from the secret nook you made in your map!
